title: Google Pixel. The person i talk to experience echo when he/she is talking
content:
When i make "a normal" call to a person he/she is hearing them selves as echo while they are talking. Nice if someone have experienced this and fixed it. What i have tested is:

Call via bluetooth works OK.  No echo.
Call and set the call on speaker works OK. No echo.
Call and connect  usb-c pixel buds works OK. No echo.
Turned of all wifi, bluetooth, gps, etc. No luck. Still echo.
Latest updates. Still echo.
Reboot in safe mode. Still echo.
Factory reset (without installing apps). Still echo.
Switch to wifi call. Still echo.

Please help.
